page.title: 04LIGHT INDUSTRY
page.content: {List of trading concerns on the Love {Lane Industrial Estate: Agricultural Engineers,Boats,Building and Timber, Car Dealers,Coal merchant, Computer systems, Conservatory Manufacturers, Contractors,Plant and Machine Hire, Dairy,DIY and Garden, Double glazing, Electronics, Fencing, Furniture, Glaziers, Heating, Sanitorial supplies, Joinery, Linen Hire,Motorcycles, Painters, Petrol Service Station, Printers, Precision Engineers, Scrap Metal, Domestic removals,Screen Printing,Shopfitters, Sign Makers,Tool Makers,Tyre Dealers. ____________________________________ {Cottage industries in Cirencester {Workshops:}bookbinding, clock & watch repairs,pottery,wrought iron and illustrating. The town is popular as it has good road links to M4,M5, Wales, S and S.W.
